comment: This class is very easy. Homework due every couple of weeks, and there are 4 tests (lockdown browser used) which are all identical to the review. Just do the work and you should get an A.

Every assignment and test is done through ALEKS. Tests are lockdown browser + webcam, but they are very easy, it is the same questions as the review! You have a couple of weeks to finish the homework for each chapter! She's so nice and answers any questions about stuff for the test. EASY A!! You have to take her!!

100% recommend this professor! The class is super easy, and she's very responsive to emails. The exams are identical to the reviews, and homework is only due every couple of weeks. If you're looking for an easy A, this is the class!
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: Amazing teacher!

I'm taking this course online over the summer. Its all on Aleks such as videos, HW, and exams. Honestly its kinda boring and Aleks isnt the best at explaining, but that is what youtube and other resources are for. Exams are lockdown with camera but you can use your notes. Also you can exempt the final. AND there are a lot of graded assignments.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Clear grading criteria--Lots of homework

comment: i hate math and i got above a 95 in this class and could exempt the exam. she is AMAZING

Mrs Taylor teaches stats super well, is really nice to the students, and gives plenty of extra credit and help. Attendance is extra credit in the form of a kahoot, usually with a "would you rather" question that's a nice break from equations. Take her class!
Loved her class, she was really nice and was easy to follow along. Homework provided in Aleks which helps prepare for the online tests which are proctored. Easy A!

Took her for biostatistics and still use the notes for upper-level classes. Does a great job of going over the material in lecture. Not a hard class, but there are several useful projects. Makes sure everyone understands and is very kind.
Best math teacher I have ever had

She is by far one of the best professors i've had. shes so caring, respectful and sweet and will help u on any assignment that you have questions on. she made learning this course easy and i actually understood. please take her if you can!

Really liked this class, just make sure you review for the tests and you will do really well. So many extra credit assignments, I ended the class with 100%. Really try to aim for a 95% so you can exempt the final. Prof. Taylor is very nice and always able to help with hw assignments. Hw is always harder than the tests so don't let that throw you :)

Attendance is not mandatory, but you will need to watch out for in-class assignments and projects. She will help with projects and in-class assignments. Has notes are already made up for the class just fill in the empty blanks and follow along. If you miss class she has annotated notes online as well. Quizzes and tests are online open note.

It's Bloom's level 4 course, setting up students for later classes that require written statistical data reports and interpreting rtps. Lecture notes are outlined to motivate students to be active listeners w/fill in the blanks. R studio projects are time-consuming but directly related to lectures with built-in-class project time with assistance.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class

comment: I'll say it a million times, prof Taylor is the BEST! If math isn't your thing and you're worried about failing, she will make sure that doesn't happen! She is so good at teaching the concepts, they always make sense no matter how difficult it might seem. She makes sure to get to know her students & offers extra credit for attendance. Take her!

She is awesome! If you get the opportunity to take her, please do! This class will not occupy much of your time, focus in class and complete assignments and you will succeed. She tells you everything you need to know for each assignment.

You get a lot of extra credit opportunities, quizzes are open note and you get a cheat flash card for tests. She explains things really well and gives you opportunities to help you understand the material

If you have to take stat TAKE HER! She is amazing. Literally felt like I was taking a freshman class in high school. This class was so easy and attendance isn't required. She posts every lecture on d2l and hw is done thru aleks. Lots of extra credit opportunities and if ur have a 95 or higher after the last test, u don't have to take the final!!
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Graded by few things--Accessible outside class

comment:
Professor Taylor is so real! 

- you NEED a Ti-83 or Ti-84 (CE) calculator
- NO TEXTBOOK
- I hate math but she's so great I gained an interest
- Prioritizes knowing students' names
- I always look forward to attendance because she asks fun questions
- Material outside of class is very accessible
- She's SO SWEET and pretty funny if you ask me!

Professor Taylor is amazing!!! She makes her class very simple and easy. Every time she goes over material, she encourages students to ask questions to make sure that we understand. She goes over all the problems and gives us help whenever we need it. She does a great job at preparing us for quizzes and tests. If I could, I would have her again!

I am not good at math, never have been, and probably never will be. But, Shelby genuinely is one of the best professors I have ever had. She is incredibly good at explaining somewhat complex topics in a way that makes it click in your head. I believe she is a masters student, but I sincerely hope she considers a career in teaching. Take her!!!

I highly recommend Professor Taylor. I was dreading this class, but I'm finishing with an A. She's very fast at responding to emails, is always willing to help, and makes the class very easy to succeed in. Attendance is not mandatory, but it counts as bonus points if you attend. Her lectures are very easygoing and she offers extra credit.

If you struggle in math, take her class. Ms. Taylor is organized so you know what to expect each week and she will remind you in class when upcoming due dates are so you don't miss anything. She is super sweet and caring, I HIGHLY RECOMMEND! You need to go to class though it will make your life 100 times easier, she's sweet so its an easy to go to.

Professor Taylor is by far one of the best. I felt bad that my class didn't participate in class much. She's such a nice genuine person. She goes off her teaching notes and goes over everything. While she does take attendance, she excuses 5 absences, but attendance is more like bonus points to your grade. She's very understanding.

I took Ms. Taylor over the summer and online, where we met over zoom. She was fantastic! Easy to understand, helpful, doesn't overwhelm you, easy to reach with any questions. Offers extra credit for showing up! Allows you notecards on the quizzes & tests!

such a sweet professor. her class was super easy and she was always willing to stay and go over homework or test questions if you needed help. attendance was kinda mandatory, but she excused 5 absences and gave a 2% bonus for coming to class. lots of homework and quizzes, but not terrible.

I absolutely loved this professor! Weekly online homework that was exactly what we learned in her lectures, extra credit for showing up to class, & straightforward tests that are explained in her study guides. Very caring & respected by students. You can't go wrong with Prof. Taylor - please take her!

Prof. Taylor is so sweet and genuine. She loved to answer our questions, and you can really tell that she is passionate about what she does. She makes a huge effort to get to know her students as well as sharing a little about her self which made class more personal. She is also really quick to respond to emails and offers help outside of class.

Professor Taylor has an impressive and highly effective instruction style.  Attend and participate in every class, do the homework & practice.  You are provided with annotated notes by chapter and module, ample worksheets to practice problems with, and prior class session videos for reinforcement.  I will miss this awesome professor!

Best professor ever! Very caring for her students' well-being & knowledgeable about what she teaches. She teaches in a way that is easy to understand, and she doesn't go too fast either. She always shows up to class with a great attitude & is very open to questions & concerns from students. Please take her, you will NOT regret it!

I wish I could give her a 10. She is AMAZING! Take this professor if you can. She is a great teacher and records all her lectures so if you miss anything it is all online. She answers emails so fast and wants you to succeed. I would take her 100 times if I could. Sweetest professor I have ever had.

Professor Taylor is the best! If you struggle in math, she is the professor for you. The methods she uses to teach helps concepts become understandable, & she doesn't rush through the material. She's very caring and willing to help if needed, plus extra credit is also there for those who attend class regularly. I finished with a high A!

Professor Taylor is definitely your go-to when choosing a good professor for stats. She makes the content very easy to understand, and the homework/tests are very manageable. You'll see from day one that she is very caring & makes sure that her students are set up for success. (Not to mention, there's also extra credit!) Take her if you can !!

Professor Taylor is a really interesting teacher that cares and respects her students. She teaches the material very well and goes slow for people who may not understand the material well. If you actually show up to class, pay attention, and do all the work, this class should be a breeze.

Professor Taylor is awesome!! Very caring and it shows. She gives weekly homework, but it is a very minimal amount and was never too difficult. Tests were simple as well. Lectures well and does a great job at communicating with students to make sure everyone understands. Def would take again!
Amazing professor. She explains concepts very well and makes note taking super easy.

Professor Taylor is amazing! Math has never been my thing but taking her stats class was the best experience. She is so caring, understanding, and great at teaching. PLEASE take her class if you want to truly learn and succeed!

Professor Taylor is the best STAT professor at KSU!!! She cares about her students, she makes class fun, exciting, and engaging. She is easily approachable and will help you with concepts. She wants her students to succeed. I finished the class with a 99 %.
I definitely recommend her, I've never been good at math and she made this glass very doable. I even made an A

She is amazing I took her over the summer and I have to say I SUCK AT MATH. This has been the first professor ever that I could really understand step by step and the first professor who really made me enjoy math  and not hate it, like i actually looked forward coming to her class and I didn't mind driving 1hr 10 mins, thats how much i enjoyed it
Professor Taylor is incredible. I was struggling with stats and she made it so clear to me. She's amazing

Professor Taylor was an awesome professor. You do have weekly assignments done throughs "Aleks" but theres not an overwhelming amount, nor were they ever THAT difficult. For my semester, she offered zoom classes as well if you were unable to attend and you still get attendance credit. Come to class, take notes and you'll do fine

Professor Taylor was honestly a God-send in my life. She made me feel so appreciated as a student and consistently put in her best effort as a professor. She is beyond supportive and will do everything she can to make sure you succeed. Math is a struggle for me, and she still helped me ace this class. Put in the effort and you can too.

I loved Professor Taylor. She's great at explaining stats and the concepts build very naturally on each other. She cares about her students' success and will strike questions from quizzes and tests if they confused a lot of people. Homework was very manageable and was good practice for the quizzes and tests. Definitely take Professor Taylor!

Professor Taylor is so sweet and helpful. You can email her with questions and if she can't answer it through email, she will set up a zoom meeting or face to face meeting with you. She is strict on her grading policy. She provides notes that you can follow along with in class. If you do these, the quizzes and tests will be easy. Great teacher.

I took this course in the Fall of 2021, when this course was hybrid. The lectures were all livestreamed and then accessible online at any time. She had printable note guides, where some blanks were left for students to fill in using the lectures. Quizzes were open note and using ALEKS, use the homework to learn and the filled in notes to pass easy.

She is literally the best!! If you show up to class and are good at taking notes you should pass with an A. Being that this was my first semester of college I slacked a lot but she helped me get back on the right track. She set up weekly appointments with me to help me with any problems I had and she allows open note quizzes and on test a 3x5 index
Professor Taylor is great. She is super understanding and helpful when you need her. She is a great teacher and has a good knowledge of the subject she is teaching.
rating_tags: Accessible outside class--Skip class? You won't pass.--Caring

comment: My absolute favorite professor so far at KSU. So caring and clearly wants you to succeed in the class. She is accessible for questions and offers a lot of study resources. Her course format was very easy to understand and learn from. As long as you go to class and reach out to her for help when you need it, you'll pass. Definitely recommend.

I love Professor Taylor's class. I have classmates who struggled with the material but she is very caring and does her best to make sure everyone does well. She gives you 5 no question asked absences and attendance counts as a grade. She drops your lowest quiz also. She is very accessible outside of class. I recommend!

Best stat teacher. She explains everything and has amazing notes. She genuinely cares about you passing. Uses ALEKS for homework (10%), lowest quiz grade dropped, and if you have a 95% in the class you dont have to take the final.

My grade was only a B because I decided not to show for class for almost two weeks. She is a very good teacher, teaches like a highschool teacher. She is very clear about everything and walks around asking if you have questions (which none of my others do). She answers every email within an hour even on holidays if something was due. She is great!

Professor Taylor is absolutely amazing. If you have to take Stats and you have her as an option, dont miss out! She is so clear with her lectures. She makes it a priority to answer any questions anyone may have. She also makes it a priority to get to know her students. There is no way you can go wrong with her.

Professor Green is honestly the best math teacher I have ever had. She is so thorough with the information and she gives so many examples that are just like the tests. She allows open note quizzes and you are allowed a notecard (front and back) for tests. Can exempt the final if you have a 95. All tests and quizzes on webcam and lockdown browser!

Skip class? Go ahead and take a C at best. However, she is very good at keeping lectures interesting and clearly explaining concepts. Statistics is merely plugging numbers into an expensive calculator, but she gives us a clear understanding of what exactly we're doing. You get two attempts on quizzes, and a index card cheat sheet for every test.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Clear grading criteria--Amazing lectures

comment: She is new to teaching, but you would not be able to tell. Her programming material is laid out well to know exactly what you are doing and when. Her homeworks are a little tougher than classwork, but they are not so difficult you will want to pull your hair out. She is fair and very eager to help everyone. You can sense that new prof attitude

one of the best most caring professors Ive had at KSU. will bend over backs to see you do will!! genuinely cares about her students. aleks homework and quizzes with multiple attempts, lockdown tests that are open note! do yourself a favor and take her!!

Professor is a very caring, fun, and youthful lady. She explains things well and is always there to help outside of class. Im trash at math and it was only for her that I got a B. There is a good bit of he and some quizzes. Tests arent terrible but definitely practice beforehand.

LOVE HER!!! her class is mandatory but she literally explains everything very well. the material isnt that hard either and this class is an easy A! you can tell she loves teaching and she is good at it too and doesnt move on until everyone understands. make sure to get TI 84 calculator because you will use it everyday for everything.
Super nice. Easy to understand. Willing to help.
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class

comment: She is a great teacher and gets back to you if you have any questions. The reviews are very helpful when it comes to tests. She gives many extra credit opportunities and at the end of the semester, replace your lowest test score with your final grade.

Coming into finals week i had a 69 and then i got a 97 on the final which brought my grade up immensely, but not as much as when Professor Taylor changed our lowest test grade to our final grade as well. I struggle in math, but Professor Taylor made it bearable.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Lots of homework--Clear grading criteria

comment: Shelby has been a great and very accommodating professor during COVID-19. She did everything she could to make sure her class and material was understandable. She was very accessible if you need help with anything. You do hw on ALEKS, 3 tests and 1 final, mini quizzes every couple weeks. All open note and easy if you listen to the short lectures

Shelby is a great professor and she really made this class as fun as math could be. This class was a hybrid of sorts due to COVID, but attendance wasn't required in person or online. She makes her own videos that are short and to the point for those who are fast learns. She's always available to ask questions, and replies fast.

She cares about you doing well in her class. She responds quickly to emails. She one had a call with me at 10pm because I didn't understand anything the night before a test. If you have an any issues just let her know, she will make you feel like a smart person even if you keep getting answers wrong. I would def recommend her!
She was very easy to understand, I did amazing in her class
Great teacher, willing to help, homework comes from aleks. Teaching notes are thorough,clear, and helpful!
